maintext: South Simcoe Police were called to a home in Bradford after a report of domestic assault. Officers were informed that a woman had been assaulted and threatened by her husband in that home and that the assault only ended when a relative entered the room. A 27 year old Bradford man has been charged with Domestic Assault and Uttering Threats. He was released on conditions that he reside elsewhere and avoid the victim while he awaits his court date.
title: Domestic Assault
